headline: AvalonBay Communities, Inc. Announces Participation in Nareit’s REITworld Conference, Provides Fourth Quarter 2025 Capital Markets Update and Publishes Updated Investor Presentation
summary: ARLINGTON, Va., December 08, 2025--AVALONBAY COMMUNITIES, INC. (NYSE: AVB) (the "Company") announced today that the Company will be participating in Nareit’s REITworld Conference from December 8 – 11, 2025.
